title: lowhangingfruitgrab
extract: noun. 1. the fruit that grows low on a tree and is therefore easy to reach. 2. a course of action that can be undertaken quickly and easily as part of a wider range of changes or solutions to a problem.
extract_html: noun. 1. the fruit that grows low on a tree and is therefore easy to reach. 2. a course of action that can be undertaken quickly and easily as part of a wider range of changes or solutions to a problem.
